biotools.summary: Goslin is the Grammar of succinct lipid nomenclature project. It defines multiple grammers compatible with ANTLRv4 for different sources of shorthand lipid nomenclature. This allows to generate parsers based on the defined grammars, which provide immediate feedback whether a processed lipid shorthand notation string is compliant with a particular grammar, or not.

bioschemas.name: Goslin
